prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with a leafy appearance and a friendly expression.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small dinosaur with green leaves on its back.
Generate a cute Pokemon with a long neck and a plant theme for my collection.
Make a nature-loving Pokemon that has a gentle demeanor and vibrant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a mix between a reptile and a tree.
Design a creature that thrives in forests and has an earthy color palette.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by the beauty of nature and harmony.
